plugins.name: New Project Page Generator
plugins.description:
Ah, the empty canvas—a realm of endless possibilities, yet occasionally a breeding ground for what's known as 'designer's block.'


No need to fret! Say goodbye to sifting through past projects for page ideas. Consider us your design assistant, streamlining your creative process effortlessly by kicking off your new design project with a set of pages.


📘 "Cover" Page: Make a stunning first impression with real-time project status.


🌟 "ABOUT THIS PROJECT" Section: Dive into project details effortlessly.


💡 "Purpose Of This Project": Clarify project objectives in a snap.


👥 "Who Is This For?": Define your audience with flair.


🛠️ "For Development": Access development resources in one place.


🏗️ "WORK IN PROGRESS" Zone: Keep track of ongoing phases.


🚧 "In Progress" Pages: Monitor the journey of User Flow, Wireframing, and Design.


🎉 "COMPLETED" Section: Celebrate project milestones.


✅ "Completed" Pages: Showcase the triumph of User Flow, Wireframing, and Design.


🌟 "INSPIRATIONS & SOURCES" Hub: Curate ideas and references effortlessly.


🧩 "Concepts" and "References": Organize your creative fuel.


🧱 "BUILDING BLOCKS" Zone: Unlock your stash of reusable design elements.


🎨 "My Local Components": Your personal design arsenal.


💀 "GRAVEYARD" Section: Where design ideas rest (or return).


Enjoy.

Julian

accepted.name: Julian Oczkowski
accepted.description: Lead Product Designer, tinkering with Typescript and APIs.

plugins.tagline: Kick off a new project today.

plugins.name: Dola Project Starter
plugins.description:
This plugin helps you, in one click, set up a new project with a good practice pages structure, variables and styles!


Generated styles and variables are based on Tailwind standards which is eliminating the gap between design and development styling primitives and improving the workflow out of the box.


This starter sets up:

  • color variables (primary shades, grays, destructive, border, etc.)
  • spacings variables
  • border radius variables
  • drop shadow effects
  • text styles (like text-2xl/font-bold, etc.)
  • grid styles (base, md, lg, xl, 2xl)
  • pages structure
  • file cover page


And many might be planned, such as:

  • generated style guide based on styles
  • components (buttons, toggles, image ratios, etc)
  • tailwind config export for developers
  • and maybe something else..


So stay tuned, and leave you feedback about what should we improve or add next.


With love,

Dola Service Team ❤️

accepted.name: Oleksandr Ploskovytskyy
accepted.description: Software Engineer

plugins.tagline: One-click project starter with Tailwind text, shadow, grid styles and pages structure

plugins.name: Frame Organizer
plugins.description:
This plugin is ideal for cleaning up frames that are slightly misaligned when creating documents.


It adjusts the spacing between frames horizontally and vertically while maintaining the overall layout. You can set the horizontal and vertical margins and the amount of misalignment to ignore.


資料作成などで、並んでいるフレームがすこしだけがたがたしているのを綺麗にするのに最適なプラグインです。


全体の大まかなレイアウトは維持したまま、横方向、縦方向のフレーム間の間隔を調整します。横方向、縦方向のマージンや、無視するズレの大きさを設定可能です。
plugins.tagline: Clean Frame Alignment

plugins.name: Componentify
plugins.description:
Say goodbye to the repeated naming work of setting variant names!


Henceforth


One click to create a components set,

Reduce the repetition of dozens of keys to two steps.


Instructions for use:

  1. Pre-fill the component variant attribute values you want to create in the plug-in；
  2. Select a Frame
  3. Click Create to turn the Frame into a set of components made using the property values set in the plug-in, and then you can modify different styles for these variations.


If you have any questions or more functional suggestions and ideas, you can leave a message in the comment area.Looking forward to it.


If it helps you, feel free to buy me a coffee.


告别设置变体名称的重复命名工作！


从此以后


一键创建组件集，


将数十个操作的重复减少到两个步骤。


使用说明：

  1. 在插件中预先填写你要创建的组件变体属性值；
  2. 选中一个 Frame；
  3. 点击创建，即可将 Frame 转变成使用插件中设置的属性值制作的组件集，接着你就可以为这些变体修改不同的样式。


如果有疑问或有更多功能上的建议和想法，可以在评论区留言，十分期待。

如果对你有帮助，欢迎给我买杯咖啡，支持我的工作

plugins.name: EcoSimulateur
plugins.description:
🌱 Figma Plugin “EcoSimulateur by Adveris”: Environmental Analysis from the Design Phase

EcoSimulateur by Adveris is a Figma plugin developed by the agency Adveris to integrate web eco-design principles from the very beginning of a digital project. It enables users to predict the EcoIndex score — the reference indicator developed by GreenIT / ecoindex.fr to measure the environmental impact of a web page — based on a wireframe or a graphic mockup created in Figma.


🔍 Plugin Objective

The goal is simple: provide an estimate of a web page’s EcoIndex (environmental footprint) before development even starts, helping to guide design decisions towards more sustainable alternatives.


🧠 How it Works

The plugin automatically analyzes the structure and graphical content of a Figma mockup, and extrapolates the future EcoIndex score of the final HTML page based on correlations drawn from past real-world web projects.

Specifically, the plugin estimates the three components of the EcoIndex:

  1. DOM Complexity: by analyzing the number and types of layers in the mockup, it estimates the complexity of the expected HTML code.
  2. Number of HTTP Requests: number to be entered by yourself (if new website: default number is GreenIT median / if existing website redesign: enter the current number)
  3. Page Weight: an estimate of the total weight (in KB) of the resources that will be generated from the mockup (based on images/videos area and average weight/px2). In "Options", you can customize weight/px2 and addvideo weight.


🛠️ A Decision-Support Tool for Designers

The plugin is preventive and educational: it helps designers spot areas in their mockup that are likely to generate a heavy or complex webpage, and therefore one with a poor environmental performance.

For example:

“Your current mockup could result in a page with an EcoIndex score of E. By simplifying some components and reducing resource usage, you could aim for a C or better.”

This immediate feedback allows adjustments early in the design process, instead of making costly corrections after development.


✅ Key Benefits

  1. Anticipation: predict a site’s environmental impact before it’s even coded.
  2. Design Optimization: steer design choices towards more lightweight and efficient solutions.
  3. Seamless Integration: the plugin is directly usable within Figma without disrupting the workflow.
  4. Team Education: raise awareness among designers about eco-design with concrete indicators.


🔗 Reference: The EcoIndex from GreenIT.fr

The EcoIndex is an evaluation method developed by the GreenIT.fr collective. It assigns a grade from A (very good) to G (very poor) to a webpage based on three factors:

  1. Page Weight (in KB)
  2. Number of HTTP Requests
  3. DOM Complexity (HTML structure)


These indicators reflect the consumption of digital resources and are translated into estimated environmental impacts (CO₂ emissions and water consumption).


💡 In Summary

This "EcoSimulateur" Figma plugin by Adveris is a simple yet powerful tool for embedding eco-design principles into the design process. It turns every mockup into a lever for environmental performance, empowering designers to act right from the earliest stages to create a more sustainable web.
plugins.tagline: Simulate the EcoIndex of your design!

plugins.name: Latest Comments
plugins.description:
🔸 What's New in V2


  1. [Optimize] redesign UI
  2. [Optimize] team ID form: now you can input both team link or team ID
  3. [New] a tutorial about how to get team link and figma token
  4. [New] select number of comments list: choose how many you want to list
  5. [New] customize comments format: make your format of comments list
  6. [New] a refresh button: you can get latest comment without reopen the plugin
  7. [New] double click to copy the comment: much easier to copy


🔸 Figma-latest-comments intro.


this plugin is used for listing the newest comments from the current figma file, and the result will display by the default format:


#@id @text
👉 @link


and you can customized the display format as you like:


  1. @id will be replaced by the comment id
  2. @text will be replaced by the comment text content
  3. @link will be replaced by the comment link
  4. @page will be replaced by the page name of the selected comment
  5. @time will be replaced by the comment created time
  6. @user will be replaced by the name of comment creator


it may simplify the handoff workflow of designer


---


🔸 V2 版本更新内容


  1. [优化] 重设计 UI
  2. [优化] 团队 ID 表单：现在你可以输入团队链接或团队 ID
  3. [新增] 一个关于如何获取团队链接和 Figma 令牌的教程
  4. [新增] 评论列表数量选择：选择你想列出的评论数量
  5. [新增] 自定义评论格式：自定义你的评论列表格式
  6. [新增] 刷新按钮：无需重新打开插件即可获取最新评论
  7. [新增] 双击复制评论：复制评论更加方便


🔸 Figma latest comments插件简介


这个插件用于列出当前 Figma 文件中的最新评论，默认的显示格式如下：


#@id @text
👉 @link


你也可以根据需要自定义显示格式：


  1. @id 会被替换为评论的 ID
  2. @text 会被替换为评论的文本内容
  3. @link 会被替换为评论的链接
  4. @page 会被替换成评论所在的 page 名
  5. @time 会被替换成评论时间
  6. @user 会被替换成评论者用户名


这可以简化设计师的交接工作流程。

accepted.name: RyanHuang 👀
accepted.description:
🔸 Product Designer
🔸 Heavy user of Figma
🔸 Beginner in FE

plugins.tagline: List the latest comments in customized format  simplify the handoff workflow of designer

plugins.name: ThumbOrg
plugins.description:
ThumbOrg is an intuitive and robust Figma plugin designed to streamline your design process and improve your productivity. It takes the hassle out of manually creating thumbnails for your Figma files and offers a systematic approach to organizing your pages.


Key Features:

  1. Automatic Thumbnail Creation: The plugin auto-generates thumbnails for your Figma files, giving you a visual overview of your designs. Say goodbye to confusion and easily identify each of your files at a glance.
  2. Efficient Page Organization: ThumbOrg allows you to arrange your Figma pages in a clean, logical manner, ensuring a smooth design flow. Maintain a coherent structure for easy navigation and improved understanding of your design system.
  3. User-Friendly Interface: With a simple and intuitive UI, ThumbOrg is a breeze to use. It seamlessly integrates into your Figma workspace, becoming an essential part of your design toolkit.


Experience a new level of convenience and efficiency in your Figma design process with ThumbOrg. It's time to simplify, organize, and visualize your designs like never before.
plugins.tagline: Visual Harmony in Your Design Workflow.

plugins.name: SVG with Tokens
plugins.description:
This plugin generates the SVG code you would like to export, but also replaces the static colors values with the original token name. For example, if the SVG would contain: stop-color="#E6EFFA", this plugin will generate instead: stop-color="var(--token-name, #E6EFFA)"


Demo: https://youtu.be/7UYkt4Ym20U
plugins.tagline: Generate the SVG code of any Figma Vector Node, including the color tokens with their default value

plugins.name: Figma Layout Fractions
plugins.description:
📐 Figma Layout Fractions


Bring CSS-style fractional layouts into Figma — now with full support for px, %, and decimal fr units.


Design responsive layout systems using familiar syntax like:


100px 50% 1fr 2fr

🔧 What it does

Apply flexible widths to any selection inside a Frame or Group

Mix px, %, and fr units in any combination

Support for decimal fractions like 0.5fr, 3.25fr, etc.

Automatically rounds widths for clean pixel-perfect layouts

Works across single or multi-row selections



🧪 Real-World Example

Container: 600px

Padding: 10px each side

Gap: 10px between items

Layout: 100px 50% 1fr 2fr


🧮 Output:


100px (fixed)

300px (50% of full width)

Remaining space split between 1fr and 2fr

53px (1/3 of leftover)

107px (2/3 of leftover)


Perfect for layout prototyping, grids, or creating design systems with math that matches the web.
plugins.tagline: Easily create responsive layouts with CSS-like fractional units in Figma.

126012.name: Figma Layout Fractions
126012.description:
📐 Figma Layout Fractions


Bring CSS-style fractional layouts into Figma — now with full support for px, %, and decimal fr units.


Design responsive layout systems using familiar syntax like:


100px 50% 1fr 2fr

🔧 What it does

Apply flexible widths to any selection inside a Frame or Group

Mix px, %, and fr units in any combination

Support for decimal fractions like 0.5fr, 3.25fr, etc.

Automatically rounds widths for clean pixel-perfect layouts

Works across single or multi-row selections



🧪 Real-World Example

Container: 600px

Padding: 10px each side

Gap: 10px between items

Layout: 100px 50% 1fr 2fr


🧮 Output:


100px (fixed)

300px (50% of full width)

Remaining space split between 1fr and 2fr

53px (1/3 of leftover)

107px (2/3 of leftover)


Perfect for layout prototyping, grids, or creating design systems with math that matches the web.
126012.release_notes:
Figma Layout Fractions v1.2 — Now with Decimal fr Support!

A small but mighty update to make your fractional layouts even more precise 💥

🚀 What's New
✅ Decimal fr Units
Use values like 1.5fr, 0.25fr, or 3.75fr to get tighter control over flexible space distribution.

✅ Mixed Units
Combine px, %, and fr all in the same layout string.
Example: 100px 50% 1fr 2fr — just like CSS grid.

✅ Pixel-Perfect Rounding
All widths are now rounded to full pixels to avoid subpixel glitches in Figma rendering.

✅ Smarter Percentage Handling
Percentage widths are calculated using the full container width (not leftover space), bringing results in line with how the web and tools like Framer behave.

🧪 Real-World Example
Container: 600px
Padding: 10px each side
Gap: 10px between items
Layout: 100px 50% 1fr 2fr

🧮 Output:

100px (fixed)
300px (50% of full width)
53px (1/3 of leftover)
107px (2/3 of leftover)
This update brings results closer to what you'd expect from modern responsive layout tools.
126012.tagline: Easily create responsive layouts with CSS-like fractional units in Figma.

plugins.name: GUI Automation
plugins.description:
This plugin checks your mockup against GUI Automation conventions so the best possible angular project can be generated.


Currently following errors and warnings are supported and recognized:

Naming Convention Error:

For recognizing the correct components they need to be named correctly.

-> Valid Names: 'button', 'checkbox', 'dropdown', 'header', 'image', 'label', 'row', 'select', 'slider', 'tab', 'text field', 'text-field'


Missing Component Error:

Groups of shapes and text should be summarized as a component.


No Auto Layout Warning:

Using auto layout in frames helps produce better placement and overall looks in the generated angular project .
plugins.tagline: This plugin checks your mockup against GUI Automation conventions

plugins.name: Figma Inspect Styles
plugins.description:
Figma Inspect Styles


Figma Inspect Styles is a powerful and intuitive plugin designed to streamline your design-to-code handoff. Whether you're a developer or designer, this plugin enables seamless style inspection for all elements in your Figma files, empowering your team with precise and efficient workflows.


Key Features:

  1. Inspect styles in both CSS and Tailwind CSS, tailored to your preferred development approach.
  2. Visualise margin, padding, and spacing effortlessly.
  3. Analyse comprehensive details of typography, colours, effects, positioning, and transforms for any layer.
  4. Choose from pre-configured colour themes and customise them based on your preferences for enhanced usability.
  5. Copy styles with a single click in your desired format: CSS or Tailwind CSS.


Experience a more efficient way to bridge the gap between design and development with Figma Inspect Styles.Ensure your team spends less time guessing styles and more time crafting exceptional user experiences. Figma Inspect Styles is built with precision to deliver value across your design and development teams.

plugins.name: Eternal Variable Export
plugins.description:
Export library variables, library styles, local variables and local styles to CSS variables and classes (for text and effect styles).


To export styles which are included in a library, you will need to go to the library file and copy the style keys from within the plugin, then go back to the file you are exporting from and paste the keys into the 'Include External Style Keys' input field. This is required because Figma does not make the styles accessibile within their APIs. Make sure your library has been published when exporting styles to ensure the output includes the changes.


Alternatively export as JSON and write your own scripts to convert into any style format you need.


Todo:

  • Make it clearer how to include external styles
  • Support additional export modes (e.g. scss)
  • Something missing? Get in touch
plugins.tagline: Export external library variables & styles, local variables & styles to css variables

plugins.name: Thumbnail Setter
plugins.description:
Easily create thumbnails from almost any selection, without needing to manually wrap layers; in both Figma and FigJam.


Figma typically requires frames, components, component sets, or sections to create a thumbnail, but with Thumbnail Setter, you can select multiple layers or component instances, and the plugin will automatically frame them in the background before setting the thumbnail.


In FigJam, where only sections can typically be thumbnails, this plugin allows you to create thumbnails from any selection, even from instances directly within FigJam – without needing to predefine them in Figma (which was the only workaround).


How to use in Figma:

  1. Select the layer(s) you want as a thumbnail.
  2. Press Cmd+K (Mac) or Ctrl+K (Windows) to open the Action menu.
  3. Switch to the Plugins & Widgets tab.
  4. Search for "Thumbnail Setter" and run it.


How to use in FigJam:

  1. Select the element(s) you want as a thumbnail.
  2. Press Shift+I to open the Insert panel.
  3. Switch to the Plugins tab.
  4. Search for "Thumbnail Setter" and run it.

From now on, you can also use Quick actions (Cmd+K or Ctrl+K).


Limitation: The plugin won’t work if you select multiple layers, including a section. However, single section selections work fine.


Feel free to share your feedback and help me make Thumbnail Setter even better!
plugins.tagline: Quickly convert any selection into a thumbnail, in both Figma and FigJam.

plugins.name: Figma to Storyblok
plugins.description:
Figma to Storyblok bridges the gap between design and content management. With just one click, you can export Figma components directly into your Storyblok space, instantly turning them into ready-to-use content blocks.


How to use the Figma to Storyblok Sync plugin:


1. Install the plugin 

Once installed, click Get Started in Figma, go through our onboarding slider, and click Connect Account in the final step.


2. Connect your account 

Use your Personal Access Token, generated in your Storyblok account, to enable a secure and seamless integration.


3. Export from Figma to Storyblok 

Select and export one frame at a time. In Storyblok, each frame becomes a universal block you can use as a component, with an auto-updated image preview.


Have feedback or need help?

Contact us at figma@storyblok.com

accepted.name: Storyblok
accepted.description:

plugins.tagline: Transform your Figma components and frames into content blocks within your Storyblok project.

134543.name: Figma to Storyblok
134543.description:
Figma to Storyblok bridges the gap between design and content management. With just one click, you can export Figma components directly into your Storyblok space, instantly turning them into ready-to-use content blocks.


How to use the Figma to Storyblok Sync plugin:


1. Install the plugin 

Once installed, click Get Started in Figma, go through our onboarding slider, and click Connect Account in the final step.


2. Connect your account 

Use your Personal Access Token, generated in your Storyblok account, to enable a secure and seamless integration.


3. Export from Figma to Storyblok 

Select and export one frame at a time. In Storyblok, each frame becomes a universal block you can use as a component, with an auto-updated image preview.


Have feedback or need help?

Contact us at figma@storyblok.com
134543.release_notes: Exported from Figma token - Required for showing the Figma icon in Storyblok Block Library
134543.tagline: Transform your Figma components and frames into content blocks within your Storyblok project.

plugins.name: Instance Generator
plugins.description:
\\ 記事を書きました！使い方等もこちらに詳しく記載しています！ //

CSVからインスタンスを一括生成するFigmaプラグインを作ってみた


概要

対象のコンポーネントのプロパティをカラムにもつCSVデータから、そのコンポーネントのインスタンスを一括生成するためのプラグインです。


ユースケースとしては、

  • 社員用の名刺データの一括生成
  • コピーライトがデザインにハマるかの大量のパターン比較

などのデザイン作業が必要だけど、データ管理をCSVで行った方が効率的な可能性がある場合を想定しています。


使い方

  1. コピー元となるコンポーネントと出力先となるフレームを作成します。
  2. コンポーネントの中で可変になる部分をプロパティ化します。
  3. プロパティ名がカラムとなった CSV データを用意します。
  4. Figma でデザインファイルを開き、「元となるコンポーネント」と「出力先のフレーム」を選択した状態で本プラグインを実行します。
  5. プラグインの中で、先ほど作成した CSV データを選択し、「作成する」ボタンを押します
  6. 出力先のフレームに CSV データから生成されたインスタンスが一括作成されます。

accepted.name: Takashi Nemoto
accepted.description: Web Engineer

plugins.tagline: CSVからインスタンスを生成するプラグイン

plugins.name: 画板json导出 Export Frame JSON
plugins.description:
Introduction

This plugin is designed to help users export detailed JSON data of selected nodes, including auto layout information, Frame nesting relationships, text properties, and more. With this plugin, users can easily retrieve structured data from design elements, facilitating data analysis, secondary development, or documentation.


功能

  1. Export complete JSON data of selected nodes, including properties like type, name, size, position, fills, strokes, and more.
  2. Support exporting text content, font name, font size, and other properties of text nodes.
  3. Support nested export of nodes such as Frame, Group, Component, and Instance, preserving the full hierarchical structure.
  4. Complete export of auto layout information, including layout mode, primary and secondary axis alignment, padding, and spacing.
  5. Safely serialized JSON data export ensures compatibility and completeness.


Usage Instructions

  1. Select one or more nodes from which you want to export data.
  2. Click the export button in the plugin, and the plugin will automatically extract all relevant information from the selected nodes and generate JSON data.
  3. The exported JSON data will be displayed in the plugin interface, allowing users to copy or download it for further use.


Notes

  1. This plugin currently supports exporting properties of common node types such as Frame.
  2. Ensure that the selected node types are supported by the plugin; otherwise, related data might not be exportable.
  3. If errors occur during the export process, check whether the nodes contain excessive nesting or complex properties. Simplify the structure if needed and try again.


简介

本插件旨在帮助用户导出选定节点的详细 JSON 数据，包括节点的自动布局信息、Frame 嵌套关系、文本属性等。通过此插件，用户可以轻松地获取设计元素的结构化数据，便于进行数据分析、二次开发或文档记录。


功能

  1. 导出选定节点的完整 JSON 数据，包括节点的类型、名称、尺寸、位置、填充、边框等属性。
  2. 支持导出文本节点的文本内容、字体名称、字号等属性。
  3. 支持 Frame、Group、Component、Instance 等节点类型的嵌套导出，保留完整的层次结构。
  4. 自动布局信息的完整导出，包括布局模式、主次轴对齐方式、填充和间距等。
  5. 导出的 JSON 数据经过安全序列化，确保兼容性和完整性。


使用说明

  1. 选中一个或多个需要导出数据的节点。
  2. 在插件中点击导出按钮，插件将自动提取选定节点的所有相关信息并生成 JSON 数据。
  3. 导出的 JSON 数据将会显示在插件界面中，用户可以复制或下载该数据用于其他用途。


注意事项

  1. 本插件目前只支持导出 Frame节点类型的属性。
  2. 请确保选定的节点类型受插件支持，否则可能无法导出相关数据。
  3. 如果导出过程中出现错误，请检查节点是否包含过多层次的嵌套或复杂的属性，建议简化结构后再试。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: Everything gets a response, but nothing gets a resolution. 事事有回应，事事不答应。

plugins.tagline: 画板json导出插件允许你轻松导出所选 frame 的 JSON 数据。通过简单的操作，你可以快速获取 Figma 设计中的 frame 属性，并将其复制用于其他开发或设计需求。
